modName: Helena Swords -One handed and Two handed-
summary: Standalone craftable retexture of silver sword. Black-red-gold coloured.
descriptionHtml:
Basically a standalone retexture of the silver swords.

I have pretty much ignored the Silver weapons in the game. I was playing on my newest save doing the companions quests and I noticed how nice models the swords have. Unfortunately silver is not my colour so I thought I\'d do a retexture of my own. This is a fairly simple retexture so it\'s nothing too special.
Craftable in the \'Daedric\' section (you need the perk). This is my first time working with standalone weapons so I hope there\'s no problems. However if you notice something wrong with it let me know and I\'ll try to get it fixed as soon as possible. These are VERY SLIGHTLY more powerful than Daecric Sword and Greatsword, so I don\'t think they\'re over powered.
I also lowered the shininess of the black part of the blade after taking most of the screenshots so it\'s not as reflective any more.

If someone actually uses any of my other retextures then these swords will match nicely with them. I think... :P

Once again let me know if there\'s any problems.
Feel free to add your own images and tell me what you think! :)
author: MessiasMummo
